CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Lofts relative to Skyline Towers?
SRP.A: Sunstone Lofts is {below} Skyline Towers in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Green Valley Homes}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Willow Creek Estates}.

VE.Q: What is Green Valley Homes's Rental Yield in 1983?
VE.A: Green Valley Homes's rental yield in 1983 is {14.21} %.

VE.Q: What is Skyline Towers's Rental Yield in 1977?
VE.A: Skyline Towers's rental yield in 1977 is {5.54} %.

VE.Q: What is Green Valley Homes's Rental Yield in 1980?
VE.A: Green Valley Homes's rental yield in 1980 is {10.59} %.

VE.Q: What are the rental yield of Crystal Cove Villas, Skyline Towers, and Sunstone Lofts in 1974?
VE.A: Crystal Cove Villas's rental yield is {6.06} %, Skyline Towers's rental yield is {6.02} %, Sunstone Lofts's rental yield is {5.99} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Rental Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum rental yield is {2.11} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Rental Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum rental yield is {15.74} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Rental Yield level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas reached approximately {7.47} % in {1975}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Rental Yield level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas's lowest recorded level is approximately {4.58} % in {1983}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Rental Yield?
SC.A: The average total rental yield is {40.27} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Rental Yield go below 38.17 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Rental Yield exceed 42.01 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Rental Yield fall between 38.09 and 42.09 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1979, did the total Rental Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 1979 and 1981?
NC.A: The change in total rental yield between 1978 and 1979 was {larger} than between 1979 and 1981.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1983, did the total Rental Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 1979 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total rental yield between 1982 and 1983 was {smaller} than between 1979 and 1982.

NC.Q: Was the total Rental Yield in 1977 higher or lower than in 1981?
NC.A: The total rental yield in 1977 was {lower} than in 1981.

NC.Q: Was the total Rental Yield in 1974 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total rental yield in 1974 was {higher} than in 1983.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Green Valley Homes} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Willow Creek Estates, Oceanview Condos, Skyline Towers, Ironpeak Residences, Sunstone Lofts, Crystal Cove Villas, Green Valley Homes}.
